heading: BOCA RATON VIRTUAL OFFICE
body: Boca Raton offers a unique combination of elegant relaxation and nature, and with a virtual office from Opus VO, peace of mind when it comes to your business needs. Conveniently located between West Palm Beach and Fort Lauderdale, Boca is the ideal location to set up your business roots. Home to many corporate headquarters in the finance, tech, and health industries, the networking opportunities are plentiful. Your virtual office, located at 1825 NW Corporate Blvd, is only a few miles from Boca Raton Executive Airport and the brand new Brightline train station, so you and your clients have easy access to all of South Florida. Located in a Class A secure building that exudes professionalism, you’ll be able to receive mail, have a live receptionist that takes your calls, and a prestigious corporate mailing address.
